name: Messenger for Messages,Chat,Video,Text,Call ID
description: The Free Messenger app will help all users open their popular messenger & Social Media applications.   Free Messengers: WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Viber, KakaoTalk, Wechat, Line, Tango, Hangouts, Snapchat, Telegram, Sarahah, Messeger, and others, fast.  Social Media Apps: Facebook Lite, Twitter, LinkedIn, Quora , GMAIL, VK, Vimeo, Pinterest, Sarahah  Messanger is free and useful messaging app. Get access to the world and connect to your friends with the brand new mesenger app.   FEATURES: - Simple chart showing messenger app use - Fast access from any screen  - Messengger cooperates with more than 500 messaging apps -Receive honest feedback from your coworkers and friends using the Sarahah -Intelligent Caller ID  Identify callers from all around the world, even those not in your contact list.Contact people directly from the messanger app.  Messenger is available for Android phones or tablets. With Massenger,   - Message to everyone with one click - Stay in touch with your friends and family - Share photos and videos with fun effects - Make voice or video messages for free - Switch to Dark Mode - Send and receive Free Messages or SMS quickly - Use messenger and compete with your friends, clim leaderboard - Express better you emotions with amazing sound stickers  Free Text and Voice Messages  Messanger App lets you send free messages in text, photos and MMS free of cost.  Dark Mode  Use Dark Mode in Messanger. To save your phones battery switch to Dark Mode.  Leaderboard  Compete with your friends by collecting points for every activity on the massenger.  Sound Stickers  Send and recieve Sound stickers with your friends. Surprise your friends with Sound massages on massenger.  This Messanger app also shows you your usage statistics of major messenger and social media applications like Facebook Messenger, Tango, Pinterest, WeChat, Kik, IMO, Xfinity, Telegram, Whatsapp, Sarahah etc.  We are constantly working to improve the features on our mesenger app. Please feel free to send in your valuable suggestions.
